title: Riot really need to start pay the guy who create diana art MORE he always delivers the best!

replies.body:
https://www.artstation.com/artist/pan

This is the artist who made blood moon diana, different guy from the other diana art I believe

Yep!
Pan did the illustration but those bottom two are by former Rioter Ironstylus! --> https://www.artstation.com/artist/ironstylus
im sad he left. whats he doing now?
afaik he's working on a fighting game now! :)
